description:
My place is close to Flatiron, Gramercy Park, Madison Square Park, Union Square, Subway 6 line.

You’ll love my place because of the location, the coziness, privacy, quietness AND King Size bed. My place is good for couples and solo adventurers.

It's awesome, simply.

Close to lots of restaurants and quiet.

6 train and always easy to get a taxi
name: Bright Manhattan Studio in Kips Bay
review:
Our stay at Zhikai was wonderful! His apartment is located close to many sights and the subway. The neighborhood itself is lively, lots of cool cafes and restaurants.
Zhikai's apartment itself was spacious, clean and very comfortabel. Zhikai is a great host & welcomed us with everything we needed :)
If we come back to NYC we would stay there again!
